A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Just terrible. After the disappointment of TFA I hoped for more but this was not it. I've decided that the Star Wars saga ends with ROTJ. These movies are just big budget fan fiction for all I care now. Welcome to corporate Star Wars. 
Disney and Marvel found huge success translating the Marvel characters to the big screen as faithfully as possible. They established the MCU. For some reason with Lucasfilm\, Disney decided to alter an already established movie universe as much as possible without just creating a whole new franchise. 
If you accept this movie as part of Star Wars\, you might as well just skip the other 7 movies since this one undoes almost everything about them. 
Again\, for me the saga ends with ROTJ. This movie made a ton of money but I suspect half the audience won't be back for Solo or episode 9.
